item.title: SAR Imaging Algorithm review in 2022
item.description: Overview Backprojection Matched-filter Polar format Range-Doppler Chirp scaling algorithms What is SAR processing? Born approximation SAR 处理算法将场景建模为一组离散的点目标，其分散的 EM 场不会相互影响。

item.title: SHAP - a reliable way to analyze model interpretability
item.description: SHAP is the most popular model-agnostic technique that is used to explain predictions. SHAP stands for SHapley Additive exPlanations Shapely values are obtained by incorporating concepts from Cooperative Game Theory and local explanations
